text: Giovanni Benfratello (1888 - 9 February 1966) was an Italian fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1888 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Palermo Category:Italian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Italy Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Date of birth missing
title: Giovanni Benfratello
